parts.text: {"word":"delectare","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語)喜ばせる、楽しませる、魅了する","english_definition":"(Latin) to delight, please, charm, amuse","examples":[{"sentence":"Poema scriptum est ad animum lectoris delectandum.","translation":"詩は読者の心を喜ばせるために書かれた。（The poem was written to delight the reader's mind.)"},{"sentence":"Spectaculum delectabat omnes spectatores.","translation":"その見世物はすべての観客を喜ばせた。（The spectacle delighted all the spectators.)"}],"collocations":["animum delectare (心を喜ばせる)","oculos delectare (目を喜ばせる)","aures delectare (耳を喜ばせる)"],"synonyms":["oblectare","iucundare","laetificare","capere","permovere"],"antonyms":["taedere","offendere","molestare"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「delectare」は、「誘い出す、引きつける」という意味の「lacio」と、強意の接頭辞「de-」から構成される。元々は「誘惑して楽しませる」といったニュアンスがあったと考えられる。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/deːˈlektaːre/","notes":"古典ラテン語の発音に基づく。教会ラテン語では /deːˈlektare/ となる場合もある。"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_infinitive":"delectāre","present_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectō","2nd_person_singular":"delectās","3rd_person_singular":"delectat","1st_person_plural":"delectāmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectātis","3rd_person_plural":"delectant"},"imperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectābam","2nd_person_singular":"delectābās","3rd_person_singular":"delectābat","1st_person_plural":"delectābāmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectābātis","3rd_person_plural":"delectābant"},"future_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectābō","2nd_person_singular":"delectābis","3rd_person_singular":"delectābit","1st_person_plural":"delectābimus","2nd_person_plural":"delectābitis","3rd_person_plural":"delectābunt"},"perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectāvī","2nd_person_singular":"delectāvistī","3rd_person_singular":"delectāvit","1st_person_plural":"delectāvimus","2nd_person_plural":"delectāvistis","3rd_person_plural":"delectāvērunt"},"pluperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectāveram","2nd_person_singular":"delectāverās","3rd_person_singular":"delectāverat","1st_person_plural":"delectāverāmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectāverātis","3rd_person_plural":"delectāverant"},"future_perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"delectāvero","2nd_person_singular":"delectāveris","3rd_person_singular":"delectāverit","1st_person_plural":"delectāverimus","2nd_person_plural":"delectāveritis","3rd_person_plural":"delectāverint"},"present_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"delectem","2nd_person_singular":"delectēs","3rd_person_singular":"delectet","1st_person_plural":"delectēmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectētis","3rd_person_plural":"delectent"},"imperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"delectārem","2nd_person_singular":"delectārēs","3rd_person_singular":"delectāret","1st_person_plural":"delectārēmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectārētis","3rd_person_plural":"delectārent"},"perfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"delectāverim","2nd_person_singular":"delectāveris","3rd_person_singular":"delectāverit","1st_person_plural":"delectāverimus","2nd_person_plural":"delectāveritis","3rd_person_plural":"delectāverint"},"pluperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"delectāvissem","2nd_person_singular":"delectāvissēs","3rd_person_singular":"delectāvisset","1st_person_plural":"delectāvissēmus","2nd_person_plural":"delectāvissētis","3rd_person_plural":"delectāvissent"},"present_imperative":{"singular":"delectā","plural":"delectāte"},"future_imperative":{"singular":"delectātō","plural":"delectātōte","3rd_person_singular":"delectātō","3rd_person_plural":"delectantō"},"present_participle":"delectāns","future_participle":"delectātūrus","perfect_participle":"delectātus","gerund":"delectandum","supine":"delectātum"}},"notes":"第一活用動詞"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「delectare」は、ラテン語において「喜ばせる」「楽しませる」「魅了する」といった意味を持つ動詞であり、しばしば文学作品や哲学的な文章において、美や快楽といった概念と関連して用いられる。対象は人だけでなく、感覚（視覚、聴覚など）や心も含まれる。","priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["delectatio (名詞: 喜び、楽しみ、快楽)","delectabilis (形容詞: 喜ばしい、楽しい、魅力的な)","delectamentum (名詞: 楽しみ、喜び、魅力的なもの)"],"related_latin_words":["gaudere (喜ぶ)","oblectare (楽しませる)","iucundus (楽しい、愉快な)","amoenus (美しい、心地よい)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"notes":"古典ラテン語の語彙であり、日常会話ではまれだが、文学や学術的な文脈では見られる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「delectare」はラテン語の動詞で、「喜ばせる」「楽しませる」という意味です。古典文学や歴史、哲学などの専門的な文脈で使われることが多く、日常会話ではほとんど使われません。この単語を理解するには、ラテン語の文法知識と、それが使われている文脈の理解が必要です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Musica aures delectat.","translation":"音楽は耳を喜ばせる。（Music delights the ears.)","type":"verb","meaning_category":"喜ばせる"},{"sentence":"Hortus oculos delectabat.","translation":"庭は目を喜ばせた。（The garden delighted the eyes.)","type":"verb","meaning_category":"楽しませる"},{"sentence":"Oratio eius animum meum delectavit.","translation":"彼の演説は私の心を魅了した。（His speech charmed my mind.)","type":"verb","meaning_category":"魅了する"}]}
